problem_text: 16.34. Suppose that G is a finitely generated group acting faithfully on a regular rooted tree by finite-state automorphisms. Is the conjugacy problem decidable for G? See the definitions in (R. I. Grigorchuk, V. V. Nekrashevich, V. I. Sushchanski˘ı, Proc. Steklov Inst. Math., 2000, no. 4 (231), 128–203). R. I. Grigorchuk, V. V. Nekrashevich, V. I. Sushchanski˘ı
